actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to place a moratorium on activity of the Federal Trade Commission with respect to certain professions and professional associations until the Congress expressly authorizes such activity.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Trade Commission from investigating or taking any action concerning any State regulated profession until Congress enacts legislation which expressly provides that the Commission has authority over professions and that the Commission's authority preempts State authority.

titles.title: A bill to place a moratorium on activity of the Federal Trade Commission with respect to certain professions and professional associations until the Congress expressly authorizes such activity.
